Title: Scared Straight
Plot:
Placed in a ""Scared Straight"" program at school, the boys visit a prison and thrash with some inmates who like Judas Priest and Iron Maiden.
videos:   Judas Priest - ""Breakin' The Law""   Plasmatics - ""The Damned""   The Dead Milkmen - ""Punk Rock Girl""
This is the original airing of this episode..
